com.magnet.context.api

Interface ContextService


  • @Contract
public interface ContextService
    Responsible for accessing current Contexts, as well as creating new Contexts.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T callInContext(Context ctx, Callable<T> callable)
      Perform a callable operation while framed in a context.
      ContextBuilder createBuilder()
      Retrieves a builder appropriate for context building.
      Context getCurrentContext()
      Retrieves the current context for the caller.
      void runInContext(Context ctx, Runnable runnable)
      Perform a runnable operation while framed in a context.
